statements: DELETE FROM user_demographics WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM user_demographics WHERE age>30 AND gender='Male'
DELETE FROM user_demographics WHERE age < 25 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM demographics WHERE id = 100 AND age > 25;
DELETE FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id IN (SELECT campaign_id FROM audience_groups WHERE group_name = 'Tech Enthusiasts');
DELETE FROM interests WHERE user_id = 123 AND interest_category = 'Sports';
DELETE FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000 AND education_level = 'Bachelor';
